document_data.mainbody:
he Lonely Vale, also known as the Forsaken Dale,While it is not explicitly stated these are both names for the same area, they each separately describe the same small region of the Savage Frontier. was the valley in the Savage Frontier that formed between the Greypeak Mountains and Greycloak Hills.
Befitting its name, the valley did not appear on nearly, if any maps at all.
The Forgotten Forest in the adjacent Backlands were situated just south of the valley.
